Guardian:Gem_Cyan.NAME: Aquamarine
Guardian:Gem_Cyan.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Gain a Crystal Ward.

Guardian:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
Guardian:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:DonusPower.NAME: Ancient Power
Guardian:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:DecasProtection.NAME: Ancient Protection
Guardian:DecasProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DecasProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:FierceBash.NAME: Fierce Bash
Guardian:FierceBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL While in Stasis, when this card's turn counter is reduced, increase its damage by !M!.

Guardian:PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
Guardian:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

Guardian:TimeBomb.NAME: Time Bomb
Guardian:TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into Stasis. NL When this card would leave Stasis, Exhaust it and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Guardian:RepulsorProtocol.NAME: Repulsor Protocol
Guardian:RepulsorProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Summon Bronze Orb. NL Your Bronze Orb attacks a random enemy for !GuardianSecondM! damage and applies !M! Weak each turn. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:GuardProtocol.NAME: Guard Protocol
Guardian:GuardProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Summon Bronze Orb. NL Your Bronze Orb grants you !M! Block each turn. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.NAME: Hyper Beam
Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Skip your next turn.

Guardian:FloatingOrbs.NAME: Floating Orbs
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an Orb_Slam to your hand.
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an Orb_Slam to your hand.

Guardian:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
Guardian:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus an additional !M! damage every turn this combat.

Guardian:Orbwalk.NAME: Orbwalk
Guardian:Orbwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL While in Stasis, when this card's turn counter is reduced, gain 1 Strength.

Guardian:WalkerClaw.NAME: Walker Claw
Guardian:WalkerClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

Guardian:SphericShield.NAME: Spheric Shield
Guardian:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your turn. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:SentryBeam.NAME: Sentry Beam
Guardian:SentryBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Place a Sentry_Wave on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Place an Upgraded Sentry_Wave on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:SentryWave.NAME: Sentry Wave
Guardian:SentryWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card. NL Place a Sentry_Beam on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card. NL Place an Upgraded Sentry_Beam on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:CompilePackage.NAME: Compile Package
Guardian:CompilePackage.DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three Packages to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:CompilePackage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three Packages to add to your hand. The cards the Package adds will all be Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageShapes.NAME: Package: Shapes
Guardian:PackageShapes.DESCRIPTION: Add a Time Bomb, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor Protocol to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageShapes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Time Bomb, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor Protocol to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.NAME: Package: Ancients
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.DESCRIPTION: Add an Ancient Power, Ancient Protection, and Ancient Construct to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Ancient Power, Ancient Protection, and Ancient Construct to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSphere.NAME: Package: Spheric
Guardian:PackageSphere.DESCRIPTION: Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSphere.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSentry.NAME: Package: Sentry
Guardian:PackageSentry.DESCRIPTION: Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSentry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageWalker.NAME: Package: Orbwalker
Guardian:PackageWalker.DESCRIPTION: Add an Orbwalk, Walker Claw, and Incinerate to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageWalker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Orbwalk, Walker Claw, and Incinerate to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageAutomaton.NAME: Package: Bronze
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: Add a Hyper Beam, Bronze Orb, and Bronze Armor to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Hyper Beam, Bronze Orb, and Bronze Armor to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Planning.NAME: Planning
Guardian:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Place the top !M! cards of your draw pile into Stasis.

Guardian:Recover.NAME: Recover
Guardian:Recover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile into Stasis.
Guardian:Recover.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place up to !M! cards from your discard pile into Stasis.

Guardian:Emergency.NAME: Emergency
Guardian:Emergency.DESCRIPTION: Return your right-most card in Stasis to your hand and reduce it's cost to 0. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Clone.NAME: Clone
Guardian:Clone.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Place a copy of that card into Stasis.
Guardian:Clone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Place two copies of that card into Stasis.

Guardian:Preprogram.NAME: Preprogram
Guardian:Preprogram.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may choose one to place into Stasis.

Guardian:GemFinder.NAME: Gem Finder
Guardian:GemFinder.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, choose a Common Gem to add to your deck.

Guardian:StasisField.NAME: Stasis Field
Guardian:StasisField.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Place this card into Stasis.

Guardian:StasisStrike.NAME: Stasis Strike
Guardian:StasisStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Place this card into Stasis.

Guardian:FuturePlans.NAME: Future Plans
Guardian:FuturePlans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in Stasis.
Guardian:FuturePlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in Stasis.

Guardian:Suspension.NAME: Suspension
Guardian:Suspension.DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand into Stasis.
Guardian:Suspension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Place a card in your hand into Stasis.

Guardian:FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
Guardian:FastForward.DESCRIPTION: Accelerate all cards in Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:ConstructionForm.NAME: Construction Form
Guardian:ConstructionForm.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, you cannot lose HP or play Attacks.

Guardian:WeakpointTargeting.NAME: Spot Weakpoint
Guardian:WeakpointTargeting.DESCRIPTION: Whenever targeted enemy takes damage, gain 1 Fleeting Strength. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:RollAttack.NAME: Roll Attack
Guardian:RollAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage if you are in Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:GemFire.NAME: Gem Cannon
Guardian:GemFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand with Gems in them. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Gem in those cards.

Guardian:ChargeCore.NAME: Charge Core
Guardian:ChargeCore.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card at the start of your next turn.

Guardian:Reroute.NAME: Reroute
Guardian:Reroute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place the next non-Exhausting Attack or Skill you play this turn into Stasis.

Guardian:PiercingHide.NAME: Piercing Hide
Guardian:PiercingHide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Thorns for this turn. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:SharpenScales.NAME: Shield Spikes
Guardian:SharpenScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Fleeting Thorns if you are in Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:PrismaticBeam.NAME: Prismatic Beam
Guardian:PrismaticBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then repeat for each Gem in this card.

Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.NAME: Prismatic Barrier
Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then repeat for each Gem in this card.

Guardian:TemporalStrike.NAME: Temporal Strike
Guardian:TemporalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage if you have a card in Stasis.

Guardian:TemporalShield.NAME: Temporal Shield
Guardian:TemporalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block if you have a card in Stasis.

Guardian:RefractedBeam.NAME: Refracted Beam
Guardian:RefractedBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

Guardian:MultiBeam.NAME: Multi-Beam
Guardian:MultiBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Play a random Beam card from your draw pile.

Guardian:BaubleBeam.NAME: Bauble Beam
Guardian:BaubleBeam.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each Gem in this card. NL Deal !D! damage.

Guardian:PrimingBeam.NAME: Priming Beam
Guardian:PrimingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage dealt by Beam cards by !M! this combat.

Guardian:SlickScales.NAME: Evasive Protocol
Guardian:SlickScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity while in Defensive_Mode. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:SpikyScales.NAME: Spiker Protocol
Guardian:SpikyScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns while in Defensive_Mode. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:ArmoredScales.NAME: Armored Protocol
Guardian:ArmoredScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block at the end of each turn while in Defensive_Mode. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:TimeSifter.NAME: Time Sifter
Guardian:TimeSifter.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis with a turn counter of 2 or more.

Guardian:Construct.NAME: Ancient Construct
Guardian:Construct.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you have no Artifact, gain 1 Artifact.

Guardian:CrystalBeam.NAME: Crystal Beam
Guardian:CrystalBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is increased by !M! for each Gem in ALL of your socketed cards.

Guardian:Gem_Yellow.NAME: Amber
Guardian:Gem_Yellow.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis.
Guardian:Gem_Yellow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis.

Guardian:Gem_Purple.NAME: Amethyst
Guardian:Gem_Purple.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.
Guardian:Gem_Purple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.

Guardian:Gem_Crimson.NAME: Garnet
Guardian:Gem_Crimson.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Guardian:Gem_Fragmented.NAME: Fragmented Gem
Guardian:Gem_Fragmented.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Gain a Crystal Shiv.

Guardian:Repulse.NAME: Repulsor
Guardian:Repulse.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the first Status or Curse drawn each turn.
Guardian:Repulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the first 2 Status or Curse cards drawn each turn.

Guardian:BronzeOrb.NAME: Bronze Orb
Guardian:BronzeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Place a random card from your draw pile into Stasis. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:RevengeProtocol.NAME: Revenge Protocol
Guardian:RevengeProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fleeting Strength whenever your Block is broken while in Defensive_Mode. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:GatlingBeam.NAME: Gatling Beam
Guardian:GatlingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Increase the damage dealt by Beam cards by !M! this combat.

Guardian:SpacetimeBattery.NAME: Shield Charger
Guardian:SpacetimeBattery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL While in Stasis, when this card's turn counter is reduced, gain !M! Block.

Guardian:StasisEngine.NAME: Stasis Engine
Guardian:StasisEngine.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and draw a card whenever you play 3 0-cost cards in a single turn.
Guardian:StasisEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain [E] and draw a card whenever you play 3 0-cost cards in a single turn.
